```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(mapview)
library(htmltools)
library(leaflet.extras)
```

```{r}
iconbmsc <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "circle",
  iconColor = '#FFFFFF',
  library = "fa",
  markerColor = "black")

iconbmscdock <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "circle",
  iconColor = '#FFFFFF',
  library = "fa",
  markerColor = "red")

iconwestgov <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "circle",
  iconColor = "#FFFFFF",
  library = "fa",
  markerColor = "red")

iconhealth <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "circle",
  iconColor = "#FFFFFF",
  library = "fa",
  markerColor = "red")

compassicon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://freesvg.org/img/CompassRose.png",
  iconWidth = 100, iconHeight = 100
)
```


```{r}
map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%
  addLabelOnlyMarkers(
    lng = -125.1346, lat = 48.83552,
    label = HTML("Bamfield Marine<br>Science Centre"),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, textOnly = TRUE, direction = "right", 
                                style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white",
                                  "padding" = "3px", 
                                  "border-radius" = "5px"
                                  ))) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    lng = -125.13543, lat = 48.83552,
    icon = iconbmsc) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    lng = -125.13674, lat = 48.83326,
    label = "BMSC South Dock",
    icon = iconbmscdock,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = "right",
                                style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white",
                                  "padding" = "3px", 
                                  "border-radius" = "5px"))) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
      lng = -125.13988, lat = 48.82896,
      label = "West Government Dock",
      icon = iconwestgov,
      labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = "left",
                                  style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white",
                                  "padding" = "3px", 
                                  "border-radius" = "5px"))) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
      lng = -125.13719, lat = 48.82711,
      label = "Island Health Dock",
      icon = iconhealth,
      labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = "right",
                                  style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white",
                                  "padding" = "3px", 
                                  "border-radius" = "5px"))) %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng = -125.152, lat = 48.83798,
    icon = compassicon) %>%
  setView(lng = -125.13806, lat = 48.83117, zoom = 15)
map
```

```{r}
mapshot(map, file = "mapfigure_zoomedin.png")
```
